Sentencas: For solid oxide fuel cells, it is an effective strategy to enhance the oxygen reduction reaction activity of cathode through introducing active nanoparticles on electrode surface.
Titulo: CO2-induced in-situ surface reconfiguration of strontium cobaltite-based perovskite for accelerated oxygen reduction reaction

Sentencas: In this study, we developed a novel cathode SrY0.05W0.05Co0.9O3-delta and optimizing strategy of CO2-induced surface in-situ reconfiguration.
Titulo: CO2-induced in-situ surface reconfiguration of strontium cobaltite-based perovskite for accelerated oxygen reduction reaction

Sentencas: The nanoscale SrCO3 particles and the oxide nanoparticles could be produced after the treating atmosphere was switched from CO2 to air.
Titulo: CO2-induced in-situ surface reconfiguration of strontium cobaltite-based perovskite for accelerated oxygen reduction reaction

Sentencas: Both SrCO3 nanoparticles and nano-oxides are beneficial to the oxygen reduction reaction kinetics of surface process and the area specific resistance of symmetric cell with SrY0.05W0.05Co0.9O3-delta electrode decreased from 0.085 to 0.054 omega cm2 at 600 degrees C.
Titulo: CO2-induced in-situ surface reconfiguration of strontium cobaltite-based perovskite for accelerated oxygen reduction reaction

Sentencas: Although the nano-sized SrCO3 was degraded in air over time, the oxide nanoparticles held a stable state for a long time and the resistance finally stabilized at-0.068 omega cm2.
Titulo: CO2-induced in-situ surface reconfiguration of strontium cobaltite-based perovskite for accelerated oxygen reduction reaction

Sentencas: However, for classic cathode Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta, it possesses a strong interaction with CO2 so that the produced large -sized
Titulo: CO2-induced in-situ surface reconfiguration of strontium cobaltite-based perovskite for accelerated oxygen reduction reaction

Sentencas: BaCO3 failed to transform into nanoparticles and totally decompose.
Titulo: CO2-induced in-situ surface reconfiguration of strontium cobaltite-based perovskite for accelerated oxygen reduction reaction

Sentencas: Therefore, designing the suitable cathode and tailoring the interaction between CO2 and electrode materials are significant to realize the CO2- induced surface in-situ reconfiguration.
Titulo: CO2-induced in-situ surface reconfiguration of strontium cobaltite-based perovskite for accelerated oxygen reduction reaction
